abilities.name: Whisper
abilities.description: Innate - Death In 4 Acts: Jhin's basic attacks consume ammunition for 4 rounds. He will reload over 2.5 seconds immediately after expending all rounds or withholding leftover rounds after 10 seconds out of combat. The latter reload can be interrupted by declaring an attack or casting an ability.
descriptions: Innate - Death In 4 Acts: Jhin's basic attacks consume ammunition for 4 rounds. He will reload over 2.5 seconds immediately after expending all rounds or withholding leftover rounds after 10 seconds out of combat. The latter reload can be interrupted by declaring an attack or casting an ability.

Jhin's final round attack will become  unstoppable,  critically strike, and deal 15 / 20 / 25% (based on level) of the target's  missing health bonus physical damage. This critical strike will occur versus structures but deals only (50% +  18.75%) AD bonus physical damage.

Innate - Every Moment Matters: Jhin gains 4% − 44% (based on level)「 (+ 0.4% per 1% critical strike chance) (+ 0.25% per 1% bonus attack speed) 」「 (+ 40% of his critical strike chance) (+ 25% of his bonus attack speed) 」  bonus attack damage.
Additionally,  critical strikes grant Jhin 10% (+ 0.4% per 1% bonus attack speed)  bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
Innate - Caught Out: Enemies who are Caught Out are  revealed.

abilities.name: Dancing Grenade
abilities.description: Active: Jhin launches a canister at the target enemy, dealing them physical damage. The canister then bounces to up to three additional enemies beyond the first, with each kill it performs increasing its damage by 35% of the base damage.
descriptions: Active: Jhin launches a canister at the target enemy, dealing them physical damage. The canister then bounces to up to three additional enemies beyond the first, with each kill it performs increasing its damage by 35% of the base damage.
The damage will also increase if Jhin kills the target the grenade last bounced off.

abilities.name: Deadly Flourish
abilities.description: Passive: Enemy  champions who cross over a  Lotus Trap or are damaged by Jhin or his allied champions are marked for 4 seconds.
descriptions: Passive: Enemy  champions who cross over a  Lotus Trap or are damaged by Jhin or his allied champions are marked for 4 seconds.
Active: Jhin fires a shot in the target direction that deals physical damage to all enemies in a line until colliding with an enemy champion, reduced by 25% against non-champions.
Striking a marked champion  roots them and grants Jhin  Every Moment Matters'  bonus movement speed.

abilities.name: Captive Audience
abilities.description: Passive: Jhin periodically stocks a Lotus Trap charge, up to a maximum of 2.
descriptions: Passive: Jhin periodically stocks a Lotus Trap charge, up to a maximum of 2.
Passive - Beauty in Death:  Takedowns on enemy  champions summon a free Blooming Lotus Trap under them.

Active: Jhin places a Lotus Trap at the target location which  stealths and arms after 1 second, lasting for up to 180 seconds and granting a small area of  sight in and around it. The Lotus Trap Blooms upon enemy contact, with enemies in the area at the time of its trigger becoming Caught Out for 4 seconds.

Blooming Lotus Traps  slow enemies within by 35% for 2 seconds before detonating, dealing magic damage to all enemies caught in the explosion. Lotus Traps deal 65% damage against non-champions and  champions who have recently been struck by another Lotus Trap.

abilities.name: Curtain Call
abilities.description: Active: Jhin  channels and  reveals himself for up to 10 seconds, gaining a wider field of view, though not a larger  vision range, during which he has the ability to recast Curtain Call up to 4 times with a 1 second static cooldown between casts.
descriptions: Active: Jhin  channels and  reveals himself for up to 10 seconds, gaining a wider field of view, though not a larger  vision range, during which he has the ability to recast Curtain Call up to 4 times with a 1 second static cooldown between casts.

Recast: After 0.25 seconds, Jhin fires a round in the target direction that grants  sight around its trajectory for 0.5 seconds and deals physical damage, which is increased by 0% − 300% (based on target's missing health), to all enemies in a line until colliding with an enemy  champion,  slowing them by 80% for 0.5 seconds, and rendering them Caught Out for 2 seconds.
The fourth shot  critically strikes for (100% +  25%) bonus physical damage.

name: Jhin
title: the Virtuoso
blurb: Jhin is a meticulous criminal psychopath who believes murder is art. Once an Ionian prisoner, but freed by shadowy elements within Ionia's ruling council, the serial killer now works as their cabal's assassin. Using his gun as his paintbrush, Jhin...
